result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: Ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: That was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ga: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.orig: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh ré
result.html: Bhí sé sin ar eolas againn ón fhaisnéis a fuair muid roimh réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé sin ar eolas againn ón ḟaisnéis a fuair muid roiṁ réThat was known to us from the intelligence we received beforehand.

result.eng: They protected me from the cold.
result.ga: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.orig: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.html: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht méThey protected me from the cold.
result.ponchtml: Ċosain siad roiṁ an ḟuaċt méThey protected me from the cold.

result.ga: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úr
result.orig: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úr
result.html: Cuirimis fáilte roimh an bhliain úrLet's welcome the new year.
result.ponchtml: Cuirimis fáilte roiṁ an ḃliain úrLet's welcome the new year.

result.html: Fáilte roimh cháchEveryone is welcome.
result.ponchtml: Fáilte roiṁ ċáċEveryone is welcome.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.html: Tá eagla orm roimh uisceI'm scared of water.
result.ponchtml: Tá eagla orm roiṁ uisceI'm scared of water.

result.ga: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.orig: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaí
result.html: Tá fáilte roimh dhaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ḋaoine nua i gcónaíNew people are always welcome.

result.html: Tá fáilte roimh thuairimíOpinions are welcome.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roiṁ ṫuairimíOpinions are welcome.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-EabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i Nua-EaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
